mapper.insert: insert into member(member_id, mid, password, name, birth, email_id, email_server, phone) values(seq_member.nextval, #{mid},#{password},#{name},#{birth},#{email_id},#{email_server},#{phone})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where mid=#{mid} and password={password}
select * from member order by member_id desc
select * from member where mid=#{mid} and password=#{password}
mapper.delete: delete from member where mid=#{mid} and password=#{password}
